title: Cant log in to NA region
body:
Hello, Im European who enjoy playing on memes server (NA) from time to time and today for some reason i cant log in to my NA account iv also tryed friends i get an unexpected error has occurred while logging in.
Iv tryed following:
-Restart Router/Pc
-Hextech repair tool repatch
-Repaired client
-DNS from instructions

Iv asked my european friend who plays on NA aswell and he couldnt log in too.

Any ideas?

replies.body: I cannot log into NA now for about 15 mins. I was playing just fine and it booted me off and now it says "an unexpected error occurred". I live in the US so distance isn't an issue for me.

Could be an ISP issues not routing properly, it is a pretty far distance.  See if auto-configuring your firewalls with the HRT helps.

If not, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to q.na1.lol.riotgames.com for about 5 minutes to get an overview.  Remove the first 2 IPs on the list, and let me know your results.
